item.title: Alerting on "Bootbank cannot be found at path ‘/bootbank’" in vRealize Operations
item.description:
If you boot your ESXi hosts from SD-cards or USB you might have run into this issue. Suddenly your host(s) displays the following under events: «Bootbank cannot be found at path ‘/bootbank’.»

Usually this means that the boot device has been corrupted somehow, either due to a device failure or other issues. Normally the host continues to run, until it’s rebooted that is…

item.title: HomeLabOps via Slack
item.description: Just like Lior Kamrat I’ve set up my own private Slack for messaging and alerting from various services running both in my lab and some external facing services.  It’s only been running a few days, but so far it works brilliantly and helps me keep track.
